462570.name: New Yankee in King Arthur's Court
462570.description:
When a bolt of lightning sends you back to the days of King Arthur, you trade in your farmer's hat for a suit of armor and set off on a journey to find the Fountain of Youth - or at least make it back to the present by supper! To complete your mission, you'll need to gather resources, build thriving settlements and fight off goblins and skeletons! New Yankee in King Arthur's Court combines nail-biting time management thrills with the ease-of-play casual gamers enjoy. Are you ready to begin your quest?

  • 40 amazing levels
  • Fight off goblins
  • Find the Fountain of Youth
462570.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 韩语, 荷兰语, 日语
